info.title: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT fst-based speller for Kven Finnish
info.description: This is an fst-based speller for Kven Finnish. It is based on the normative subset of the morphological analyser for Kven Finnish. The source code can be found at: https://victorio.uit.no/langtech/trunk/langs/fkv/ License: GPL3+.

acceptor.title: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT dictionary Kven Finnish
acceptor.description: Giellatekno/Divvun/UiT dictionary for Kven Finnish compiled for HFST.

errmodel.title: Levenshtein edit distance transducer
errmodel.description: Correction model for keyboard misstrokes, at most 2 per word.
